abstract: NFL Roundup; Chicago Bears hire former New York Giants defensive coordinator John Fox as head coach; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The hiring of Fox, a former defensive coordinator for the Giants, came four days after he and the Denver Broncos parted ways.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and BEN SHPIGEL

snippet: The hiring of Fox, a former defensive coordinator for the Giants, came four days after he and the Denver Broncos parted ways.

headline.main: Bears Hire Fox as Coach; Ravens Settle With Rice
headline.print_headline: Bears Hire Fox as Coach; Ravens Settle With Rice
